action.description: The recommendation of the committee(s) on HHS is to ADVISE AND CONSENT to the nomination(s).  The votes in HHS were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) San Buenaventura, Aquino, Hashimoto; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Keohokalole, Fevella.
